text: Piero Betello (born January 11, 1935 in Rome) is a retired Italian professional football player. He played for 4 seasons (29 games, 1 goal) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma, U.S. Città di Palermo and S.S.C. Napoli. ==External links== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.S. title: Piero Betello
